name: Too Much Social Covfefe
description:
Miranda needs to get ready for work. While getting ready she checks her social media, but is not impressed with all the Covfefe about the new President.

Initially this game was created for the Weekly One Hour Game Jam (#23- Covfefe) 2017. Unfortunately, it took me about 5 hours to create being that it was my first game alone. It didn't feel right to submit the game since it took 4 hours longer. #WOHGJ

Controls:

Arrow Keys = Move

Space Bar = Interact
